forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 67F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low around 45F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
